attributes.action: make Boris Johnson the next Prime Minister of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Unafraid to challenge those in the wrong, unafraid to support those under the thumb, and without a positive political reputation to defend, Boris is the vital free agent of British politics. His popular appeal, media influence and unmistakable uniqueness make him a vital asset for Britain" (Boris Johnson Fan Club). The Rt. Hon. Alexander Boris de Pfeffel Johnson is Conservative MP for Henley
